short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See whether the news websites you visit have received government funding for the COVID19 campaign.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Increase transparency for news websites you visit by viewing how much funding they have received for the COVID19 campaign. This addon uses the funding list provided by the government to inform you about the amount of funding each news website you visit has received.
For each (greek) site you visit to read news, you can click the extension icon and see the details about the amounts received. A badge will appear on the extension icon to let you know the site you just visited is referenced in the list.
